title: Marine, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 15 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the Sea
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Monkfish (Control of Landings)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Monkfish (Control of Landings) 

(No. 2) Regulations 2013 (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited monkfish (control landings) (no 2) regulation 2013 (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Marine, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 15 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the Sea
heading: 2. The Monkfish (Control of Landings) (No. 2) Regulations 2013 are
text_raw:
2. The Monkfish (Control of Landings) (No. 2) Regulations 2013 are 

amended, in Regulation 5, by the insertion after “Kinsale,” of “Renard Pier,”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 July, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [416] 3
text_norm: 2 monkfish (control landings) (no 2) regulation 2013 amended regulation 5 insertion kinsale renard pier  given official seal 29 july 2021 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th august 2021 416 3

title: Marine, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 15 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the Sea
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of these Regulations is to add Renard Pier to the list of designated 
ports of landing for all Irish and foreign boats landing more than 750 kg of 
Monkfish. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [416]
